analysis.description:

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/35/0xd933cb0333aacb8b5d248c52f194adaf5b7934b0.sol#82-86) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd933cb0333aacb8b5d248c52f194adaf5b7934b0.sol#85-86)

TokenVault.recoverFailedLock (/unique_chucks/35/0xd933cb0333aacb8b5d248c52f194adaf5b7934b0.sol#546-549) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/35/0xd933cb0333aacb8b5d248c52f194adaf5b7934b0.sol#548-549)

TokenVault.claim (/unique_chucks/35/0xd933cb0333aacb8b5d248c52f194adaf5b7934b0.sol#607-627) does not use the value returned by external calls:
